alert.note: Alert for Duplin; Inland Onslow (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 6:01PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Onslow and southeastern Duplin Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 601 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Beulaville, or 14 miles northeast of Wallace, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Half Moon, Richlands, Beulaville, Cypress Creek, Verona, Catherine Lake, Chinquapin, Potters Hill, Petersburg, Albert J Ellis Airport, Richlands South, Greenevers, Lyman and Haws Run. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
